objects.description: [CHEMISTGAMES](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0555) has been distributed as updates to legitimate applications. This was accomplished by compromising legitimate app developers, and subsequently gaining access to their Google Play Store developer account.(Citation: CYBERWARCON CHEMISTGAMES)

external_references.description: B. Leonard, N. Mehta. (2019, November 21). The Secret Life of Sandworms. Retrieved December 31, 2020.
